author: craigmcc
msg: If someone has already called FacesContext.responseComplete() on this request,
there is nothing for us to do so just return.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make it possible to configure which URL mapping to use (for the specified or
default FacesServlet servlet) when manufacturing URLs for resource identifiers.
This should help reduce conflicts in scenarios when other libraries are in use

author: bayard
msg: mail.jar and activation.jar are now upgraded to newer free-er versions

author: sebor
msg: * run_locale_utils.sh [Tru64]: Made getopts work on Tru64 by setting
the BIN_SH variable and re-executing self with the same command line
